name: Skinner

grantsPowers.name: Empowered Skinning
grantsPowers.description: Passive: Adds Skinning specific Buffs to all Energetic Harvesting Buffs

description: A responsibility not to be taken lightly, the job of a skinner is one of the most important roles in the Dying Worlds. Taking down a wild creature and acquiring the necessary hides and meats from the carrion requires absolute finesse and a distinguished spirit.
